mapper.sql: ID,PAYMENT_APPLY_ID, POLICY_ID, USER_ACCOUNT_ID, PAY_ORDER_NO, PAY_TYPE, THIRDPAY_TYPE, FROM_ACCOUNT_NAME, FROM_ACCOUNT_NO, FROM_BANK_CODE, FROM_BANK_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NO, TO_BANK_CODE, TO_BANK_NAME, PAY_APPLY_TIME, PAY_TIME, PAY_MONEY, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.update: update T_PAYMENT_APPLY SET ISVALID='0' where PAYMENT_APPLY_ID = #{paymentApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_PAYMENT_APPLY (PAYMENT_APPLY_ID, ID, POLICY_ID, USER_ACCOUNT_ID, PAY_ORDER_NO, PAY_TYPE, THIRDPAY_TYPE, FROM_ACCOUNT_NAME, FROM_ACCOUNT_NO, FROM_BANK_CODE, FROM_BANK_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NO, TO_BANK_CODE, TO_BANK_NAME, PAY_APPLY_TIME, PAY_TIME, PAY_MONEY, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{paymentApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdpayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select from T_PAYMENT_APPLY where PAYMENT_APPLY_ID = #{paymentApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
